Test Name: Whole Blood Analysis (Blood Gas, Hematology, and Coagulation)
Purpose: To analyze whole blood specimens for blood gas parameters, complete blood count, and point-of-care coagulation results while maintaining sample integrity and CLIA compliance.
Container: Heparinized blood gas syringe or dark green-top (lithium heparin) vacutainer
Equipment: Blood gas analyzer, automated hematology analyzer, and point-of-care coagulation analyzer
